generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance with parked cars along its sides.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation, and also on the right side near the parked cars.
- building: Multiple buildings line the street, including a multi-story residential building on the left and commercial buildings with storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and street, including one in the foreground and others further down the road.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible along the sidewalk and between the road and curb.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, including a red car, a blue car, and a silver car.
- pole: A traffic sign pole is visible on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign (a triangular "yield" sign) is mounted on a pole on the left side of the road.
- truck: A white van or truck is partially visible on the far right side of the image, parked on the side of the road.
